Posts.Content: Hello Sheila I'm Julia, one of the Financial Guides on the Macmillan Support Line. Claiming on insurance policies is a subject we discuss with people every day and we would be happy to hear from you to see if we can support you with a claim on your policy. As Kate says, we are available Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm (although messages can be left up to 8pm for us to call you back the next day) so do feel free to call us on 0808 808 0000 or you can email us if you prefer on financialguidance@macmillan.org.uk. Kind regards. Julia

Posts.Content: Hello everyone I’m one of the Financial Guides on the Macmillan Support Line. I’m sorry to hear about some of the difficulties you have experienced. Having a cancer diagnosis puts a lot of strain on people’s finances and that’s why Macmillan introduced this new service to support you. We would be pleased to hear from any of you as we can help with all of the matters you have mentioned or tell you where best to get the support you need. Please do call us on 0808 808 0000 and ask to speak to the Financial Guidance Service. We are here between 9.00am and 5.00pm Monday to Thursday and between 9.00am and 4.30pm on Friday. Alternatively, you can email your query to us on financialguidance@macmillan.org.uk. Kind regards.   Julia

Posts.Content: Hello everyone I am one of the Financial Guides on the Macmillan Support Line and just wanted to let you know that we are here to help you with any questions about making insurance claims if you would welcome a chat. We can also help you with other personal finance questions, so do feel free to call us on 0808 808 0000. Our opening hours are given below and you can leave a message for us to call you back until 8pm Monday to Friday if outside these hours. Kind regards. Julia
